original_text: For Ezra had set his heart to study the Law of the Lord, and to do it and to teach his statutes and rules in Israel.
korean_text: 에스라가 여호와의 율법을 연구하여 준행하며 율례와 규례를 이스라엘에게 가르치기로 결심하였었더라

sentences.original_text: For Ezra had set his heart
to study the Law of the Lord
and to teach his statutes and rules in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘에서 그의 규례와 법도를 가르치는 것이었습니다
